title: Annual Income Survey
question_text:
Suppose $100\text{ subjects}$ were asked what their annual income was last year.
This is an example of...

choices.text: An experiment, but not a double-blind experiment.
A sample, but not a stratified sample.

solution:
Subjects were posed a question, but it is not stratified as there was no breakdown of the subjects based off of certain characteristics.

Explanation of Distractors

Choice 'A' is incorrect; there is no evidence in the question that stratification was involved.

Choices 'B' and 'D' are incorrect; there was no treatment imposed, so it is clearly not any type of experiment.

Choice 'C' is incorrect; this is not a comparative observational study since no relationship between different behaviors is being measured.
